meanings.definition: A person who spoils the enjoyment of others.
meanings.sent1: The killjoys at the party complained about the music being too loud.
meanings.sent2: The group of killjoys refused to join in the fun games.
meanings.sent3: The killjoys grumbled when everyone started dancing.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds were like killjoys, threatening to ruin the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the killjoys cast a shadow over the cheerful gathering.
